column1: '''John Ellison''' ([[21 February]] [[1932]] - [[26 June]] [[2016]]) was an author, editor and member of [[The Tolkien Society]]. With [[Patricia Reynolds]] he edited six editions of the Society's annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
column2: Mallorn]]'' and, over the years, has been a regular contributor to many of the Society's pamphlets and publications.
